trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecognizeCompleted" name="RecognizeCompleted" href=""></xref> event raised by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecognizeCompleted" name="RecognizeCompleted" href=""> </xref> hendelsen opp av en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises its `SpeechRecognized` event after completing a `RecognizeAsync` operation.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>opprettes når den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objekt hever den `SpeechRecognized` hendelsen etter fullføring av en `RecognizeAsync` operasjonen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tale recognition hendelser [ved hjelp av tale Recognition hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input device's audio stream associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter plassering i den angitte enheten lyd dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen refererer til plasseringen på begynnelsen av gjenkjent uttrykket i inndataene enhetens genererte lyd dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>egenskapen refererer til den gjenkjenner posisjonen i inndataene lyd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Disse posisjonen kan være forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av tale Recognition hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The location in the input device's audio stream associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Plassering i den angitte enheten lyd dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a babble timeout generated the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om et tidsavbrudd for babble generert av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has detected only background noise for longer than was specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout*> property; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oppdaget bare bakgrunnsstøy lenger enn den som ble angitt av sin <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout*>egenskapen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an initial silence timeout generated the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om et tidsavbrudd for første stillhet generert av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has detected only silence for a longer time period than was specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout*> property; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oppdaget bare stillhet for en lengre periode enn ble angitt av sin <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout*>egenskapen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the input stream ended.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den inngående dataflyten ble avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer sets this property to `true` when a file provides the input stream for the recognizer and the end of the file is reached.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren, settes egenskapen til `true` når en fil gir den inngående dataflyten for gjenkjenneren og slutten på filen er nådd.

trans-unit.source: The end of the input stream can coincide with a successful recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Slutten av inndataflyten kan faller sammen med en vellykket recognition-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using a file as the input stream, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker en fil som inndataflyten den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the recognizer no longer has audio input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjenkjenneren ikke lenger har inndata; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Henter recognition resultatet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet er avledet fra <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>og inneholder fullstendig informasjon om et uttrykk som returneres av en operasjon for føring.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: The recognition result if the recognition operation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning resultatet hvis recognition operasjonen var vellykket; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
